name: Hydroloth
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The hydroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), water walk
* 3/day each: control water, crown of madness, fear, phantasmal killer, suggestion

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The hydroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

abilities.name: Secure Memory.
abilities.description: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

abilities.name: Watery Advantage.
abilities.description: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.
